==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=还}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|辵|睘|c1=s|c2=p|t1=walk|ls=psc}} – to go back; to return.

===Etymology===
{{rfe|zh|Is the Mandarin reading of hai2 the result of repurposing an existing character? It doesn't seem to be related to non-Mandarin readings and the Old/Middle Chinese data.}}

====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[return]] to a place; to go back to a place
#: {{zh-x|還{huán}家|to return home}}
#: {{zh-x|還{huán}鄉|to return to one's hometown}}
#: {{zh-x|還{huán}原|to return to the original state, [''chemistry''] to reduce}}
#: {{zh-x|還{huán}俗|to resume secular life}}
# to [[return]] an object; to [[give]] back
#: {{zh-x|償還{huán}|to reimburse}}
#: {{zh-x|還{huán}書|to return the books (to the library)}}
#: {{zh-x|欠 錢 不 還{huán}|to owe money (without the intention of paying back)}}
#: {{zh-x|把 我 的 手機 還{huán} 給 我。|Give my mobile back to me.}}
# to do or give something in [[return]]
#: {{zh-x|還{huán}嘴|to retort}}
#: {{zh-x|還{huán}手|to hit back}}
#: {{zh-x|還{huán}禮|to present a gift in return}}
#: {{zh-x|還{huán}擊|to fight back}}
#: {{zh-x|還{huán}價|to make a counter-offer buying price}}
#: {{zh-x|以.眼.還{huán}.眼，以.牙.還{huán}.牙|[''literally''] an eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth; [[tit for tat]]}}
# {{surname|lang=zh}}

====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[still]]; [[yet]]; indicates that the phenomenon or observation still exists or the action is still ongoing
#: {{zh-x|他 還 沒 來。|He hasn't come yet.}}
#: {{zh-x|你 怎麼 還 沒 到？|Why are you still not here?}}
#: {{zh-x|十 點 了，他 還 在 工作。|It's ten o'clock already and he is still working.}}
#: {{zh-x|幾 年 不 見，她 還 是 那麼 漂亮。|She is still very beautiful after all these years.}}
# [[even]] [[more]]; indicates an increase from a certain level or a supplement
#: {{zh-x|今年 比 去年 還 冷。|This year is even colder than last year.}}
#: {{zh-x|考試 完 還 要 上課。|(I) still have classes after the exams.}}
#: {{zh-x|他 賠 了 一 大 筆 錢，還 丟 了 工作。|He lost a lot of money and even his job.}}
# {{lb|zh|before adjectives|mostly positive}} [[passably]]; (surprisingly) [[quite]]
#: {{zh-x|我 的 成績 還 可以。|I have a passable grade.}}
#: {{zh-x|屋子{zi} 不 大，收拾{shi} 得 倒 還 乾淨。|It's quite clean for such a small room.}}
#: {{zh-x|孩子{zi} 不 大，還 挺 懂事 的。|The small kid is surprisingly quite sensible.}}
#: {{zh-x|這 蛋糕 還 挺 好吃 的。|That was a pretty tasty cake.}}
# {{lb|zh|often in rhetorical questions}} indicates condition and contrast, interchangeable with 都; [[even]]
#: {{zh-x|你 還 搬 不 動，何況 我 呢？|Even you can't move it, let alone me.}}
# indicates unexpectedness; [[really]]
#: {{zh-x|他 還 真 有 辦法。|Surprisingly he has a way to do this.}}
# indicates [[past]] events; emphasising earliness
#: {{zh-x|還 在 幾 年 以前，我們 就 研究 過 這個 方案。|The proposal has been studied by us a couple of years ago (and now you made the suggestion to study it).}}
